headline: Altria Group (MO) Surged in 2025 Amid Strong Cash Flows and Shareholder Payouts
summary: Altria Group, Inc. (NYSE:MO) is one of the Best Dividend Stocks of 2025. The company maintains a reliable dividend track record, backed by its strong cash flow. Its overall business performance remains healthy. In the first quarter of 2025, the smokeable products segment showed solid growth in adjusted operating income, largely driven by the Marlboro […]
